text: Tumi ki tadera dike ceye dekho ni yara bhana kare ye tara bisbasa kare ya tomara kache abatirna hayeche o ya tomara purbabartidera kache abatirna hayeche, tara bicara khujamte caya taguta theke, yadi'o niscaya'i tadera nirdesa deya hayechila take asbikara karate? Ara sayatana caya tadera sudura bipathe pathahara karate.
